description:
Adds style to accordion items that
have been toggled open by Spark JS.
Styles the alert as an information alert.
Styles the alert as a success alert.
Styles the alert as a failure alert.

Adds specific styles to the icon
that is used for closing the alert.

context.name: .sprk-c-Alert__icon--dismiss

description:
Reduces the padding of the normal button
to $space-inset-short-m.

Makes the button full width of its parent container until it flips
to normal width at the $sprk-btn-breakpoint-xs breakpoint.

Makes the button full width of its parent container until it flips
to normal width at the $sprk-btn-breakpoint-s breakpoint.
Styles the button as the secondary variant.

context.name: .sprk-c-Button--secondary

description: Styles the button as the tertiary variant.

context.name: .sprk-c-Button--tertiary

description: Use on cards that you would like to standout from the rest.

Sets `max-width` to 100%, allowing card to fill
the entire width of it's container. Best used
with base cards.

Adds a background color to every
even-numbered row in the dictionary.

Adds styles to indicate that the dropdown
link is currently active.

A Spark utility class that can be used on
the Highlight Board to make it become 100% width.

context.name: .sprk-u-FullWidth

description: Adds the styles for Highlight Boards with an image.

context.name: .sprk-c-HighlightBoard--has-image

description: Adds the styles for the Stacked Highlight Board variant.

context.name: .sprk-c-HighlightBoard--stacked

description: Adds styles for filled Icons.
Adds styles for small filled Icons.

Adds the fill and stroke properties
set to the current color of its container.

Adds the fill property set
to the current color of its container.

Adds the Icon height and width
to $sprk-icon-l and stroke-width
to $icon-custom-stroke-width-l.

Adds the Icon height and width to
$icon-xl and stroke-width to
$icon-custom-stroke-width-m.

Adds the Icon height and
width to $icon-xxl and
stroke-width to $icon-custom-stroke-width-s.

Adds styles for
Icons that serve as toggle controls.

Rotates Icon -180 degrees.
Should be used in conjunction
with .sprk-c-Icon--toggle.
Adds styles for the Masthead when it is open.

context.name: .sprk-c-Masthead--open

description: Adds styles for the Masthead when the user scrolls past it.

Adds styles to hide the Masthead
when a user scrolls on a narrow screen.

Adds an underline on links used in
the big navigation bar.

Adds an active state color and bold
font weight to active big navigation items.
Adds open styles to open big navigation items.
Adds top divider when open.

context.name: .sprk-c-MastheadAccordion__item--open

description: Adds selected item background highlight and left color bar.

Adds styles for the Wait Modal
variant. Applies center alignment.

Adds styles for the
currently selected pagination link.
Adds a border around the Promo.

Adds styles for the image
in the Flag Promo variant.
Adds styles for the Flag Promo variant.

Adds the needed styles for
when the Stepper has
a dark background color.

context.name: .sprk-c-Stepper--has-dark-bg

description:
Adds the selected styles to the step that
is selected.

context.name: .sprk-c-Stepper__step--selected

description:
Adds styles to the step that are
required when the Stepper has a slider.
Adds styles for the last step in the Stepper.
Adds styles for the first step in the Stepper.

Goes on the step content when the step
has a description in addition to the step heading.
Adds the active state styles to the slider.

context.name: .sprk-c-Stepper__slider--active

description: Adds styles to hide the step content.

Use this when the Stepper
is paired with a Carousel.

context.name: .sprk-c-Stepper--has-carousel

description: Adds active state styles to the Tab button.
